Alright, you're ready to use TOOL_NAME. Now start collaborating on SITE_NAME!
Are you sure you'd like to end your TOOL: Você tem certeza que deseja encerrar sua sessão no TOOL_NAME?
Audio chat requires you to use a <a href: Audio chat requires you to use a newer browser!
Change your avatar, name and user color: Change your avatar, name and user color using the Profile button.
Copy and paste this link into IM or emai: Copy and paste this link into IM or email to invite friends.
Copy and paste this link over IM or emai: Copy and paste this link over IM or email:
Friends who join your TOOL_NAME session: Friends who join your TOOL_NAME session will appear here.  You can click their avatars to see more.
If your browser supports it, click the m: If your browser supports it, click the microphone icon to begin a audio chat. Learn more about this experimental feature here.
Internet Explorer <a href=\"https://gith: Internet Explorer atualmente não é suportado. Se você quiser experimentar TOOL_NAME, nós sugerimos utilizar Chrome ou Firefox.

Send the above link to a friend so they: Send the above link to a friend so they can join your session!  You can find this invite link on the TOOL_NAME dock as well.
Set up your avatar, name and user color: Set up your avatar, name and user color above.  If you'd like to update it later, you can click your Profile button.
Talking on your microphone through your: Talking on your microphone through your web browser is an experimental feature.
TOOL_NAME is a service for your website: TOOL_NAME is a service for your website that makes it easy to collaborate in real-time on SITE_NAME
We're sorry, TOOL_NAME doesn't work with: Desculpe-nos, TOOL_NAME não funciona com este browser. Por favor mova para um browser suportado para experimentar TOOL_NAME.
We need your help fixing TogetherJS on I: We need your help fixing TogetherJS on Internet Explorer! Here are a list of IE GitHub issues we need fixed that you can work on.
When your friends join you in your TOOL_: When your friends join you in your TOOL_NAME session, you can chat with them here!
Would you like to join their session?: Would you like to join their session?
You can continue to try to use TOOL_NAME: You can continue to try to use TOOL_NAME, but you are likely to hit lots of bugs.  So be warned.
You can invite more friends to the sessi: You can invite more friends to the session by sending the invite link in the TOOL_NAME dock.
Your friend has asked you to join their: Your friend has asked you to join their TOOL_SITE_LINK browser session to collaborate in real-time!
screen_sharing_confirm_text: Se você decidir continuar, você irá compartilhar a tela do seu site com o atendente, permitindo que ele consiga lhe ajudar com mais eficiência.
Your site's screen is already shared wit: A tela do seu site já está sendo compartilhada com o atendente.
